description: {"blocks":[{"key":"bdqc4","text":"This protocol describes the method for antibody staining of FFPE tissues on slides using CODEX barcoded antibodies.  The Akoya Phenocycler-Fusion user manual was modified to include photobleaching steps.  Included are the stepwise protocols for pre-staining, deparaffinization, antigen retrieval, photobleaching, antibody staining and post-fixation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Human BioMolecular Atlas Program (HuBMAP) Method Development Community
CHOP TMC CODEX on FFPE Tissue

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"cvtp9","text":"Use positively charged slides.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3p7aq","text":"Keep tissue sections from drying during transfer steps","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8kkb5","text":"Bake sample slide/s in an incubator at 65°C for 1-3 hours until paraffin thoroughly melts.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"beuv7","text":"Immerse sample slide/s in a coplin jar containing the following reagents for 5 minutes each: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"213nj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fan8b","text":"a.Histochoice ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1306k","text":"b.Histochoice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fplf4","text":"c.100% Ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46sg5","text":"d.100% Ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6m3cv","text":"e.90% Ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aa4pb","text":"f.70% Ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6e1an","text":"g.50% Ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhek0","text":"h.30% Ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fuh92","text":"i.ddH2O ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9219v","text":"j.ddH2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fcmr0","text":"In a coplin jar, prepare 50 mls of a 1x citrate buffer. Dilute 10x citrate buffer pH6.0 to 1X citrate buffer in ddH2O. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1e2q7","text":"Immerse sample slide/s in the coplin jar containing the 1x Citrate buffer and cover the coplin jar with aluminum foil. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"24li1","text":"Fill the pressure cooker with 1200 mls of ddH2O. Place the aluminum foil covered coplin jar containing sample slide/s in the pressure cooker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ebljq","text":"Set the pressure cooker to the high-pressure protocol and let the tissue incubate for 20 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2k1g0","text":"After incubation in the pressure cooker, release the pressure and carefully remove the coplin jar from the pressure cooker and allow to cool at room temperature for 30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"569q7","text":"Cool sample slide/s at room temperature for 5 minutes to allow the sample slide/s to cool to room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d3hum","text":"Place sample slide/s in a coplin jar containing 50 mls of ddH2O for 2 minutes.  All volumes for coplin jar incubations will be 50 mls henceforth in this protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6sf6q","text":"Place sample slide/s in a second coplin jar filled with ddH2O and incubate for 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3geaq","text":"Place sample slide/s in a third coplin jar filled with 1X PBS and incubate for 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"llqp","text":"Submerge the sample slide/s in a 150 mm petri dish containing 50 mls of 4.5% (w/v) H2O2 and 20mM NaOH in PBS (bleaching solution). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eljd6","text":"Sandwich the petri dish between two broad-spectrum LED light sources for 45 minutes at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ji6e","text":"After 45 minutes move the sample coverslip(s) into a new petri dish with fresh bleaching solution and photobleach for another 45 minutes at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1bjfj","text":"Wash the sample slide/s three times for 2 minutes each in coplin jars containing 1X PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7auh9","text":"Immerse the sample slide/s in a coplin jar containing 50 mls of CODEX® Hydration Buffer and incubate for 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63nd3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"s8fq","text":"Move sample slide/s to a second coplin jar containing CODEX® Hydration Buffer and incubate for another 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dekfp","text":"Move sample sample slide/s to a coplin jar containing 50 mls of CODEX® Staining Buffer and incubate for 20-30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2k0hr","text":"Prepare a stock solution of CODEX® Blocking Buffer to be used for the Antibody Cocktail. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9jdmp","text":"     CODEX® Blocking Buffer      1 Sample        Staining Buffer [µL]      181        N Blocker [µL]      4.75        G Blocker [µL]      4.75        J Blocker [µL]      4.75        S Blocker [µL]      4.75        Total [µL]      200   ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":236}],"data":{}},{"key":"8n7rj","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","6_0":"","6_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[128,100],"data":[["  CODEX® Blocking Buffer  ","  1 Sample  "],["  Staining Buffer [µL]  ","  181  "],["  N Blocker [µL]  ","  4.75  "],["  G2 Blocker [µL]  ","  4.75  "],["  J Blocker [µL]  ","  4.75  "],["  S Blocker [µL]  ","  4.75  "],["  Total [µL]  ","  200  "]],"guid":"0C75C201A57611EC991C0A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["  CODEX® Blocking Buffer  ","  1 Sample  "],["  Staining Buffer [µL]  ","  181  "],["  N Blocker [µL]  ","  4.75  "],["  G2 Blocker [µL]  ","  4.75  "],["  J Blocker [µL]  ","  4.75  "],["  S Blocker [µL]  ","  4.75  "],["  Total [µL]  ","  200  "]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3k5qa","text":"Add CODEX® Blocking Buffer to a tube designated for Antibody Cocktail Staining Solution. The volume of CODEX® Blocking Buffer to be prepared for each sample slide/s can vary depending on the titer and corresponding volume of each antibody. Adjust volume of CODEX® Blocking Buffer so that the final volume of the Antibody Cocktail Staining Solution is a total of 200 μL per tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ekas","text":"Add the appropriate volume of each CODEX antibody to the Antibody Cocktail Solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6b5nh","text":"Pipette to mix and briefly spin down the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b45q5","text":"Remove sample slide/s from the coplin jar containing Staining Buffer and place it on the tray of a humidity chamber.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b6pf5","text":"Add 190 μL of the Antibody Cocktail to each of the sample slide(s) and ensure that the liquid covers the entire tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"es9ft","text":"Incubate overnight in the humidity chamber at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2pnsi","text":"After overnight antibody incubation, immerse the sample slide/s in a coplin jar containing 50 mls of CODEX® Staining Buffer for 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8erch","text":"Place sample slide/s in a second coplin jar containing CODEX® Staining Buffer for 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5fg3e","text":"Place sample slide/s in a coplin jar containing 50 mls of 1.6% PFA in CODEX® Storage Buffer and incubate for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29a58","text":"Transfer sample slide/s to a coplin jar containing 50 mls of 1X PBS.  Lift and immerse the sample slide/s 2-3 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8n69f","text":"Transfer sample slide/s to a second coplin jar of 1X PBS and immerse sample slide/s 2-3 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"80mmr","text":"Transfer sample slide/s to a third coplin jar of 1X PBS and immerse sample slide/s 2-3 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7970i","text":"Transfer sample slide/s to a coplin jar containing Ice cold methanol and incubate for 5 minutes on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6gjcf","text":"Place a coplin jar of 1x PBS next to the methanol coplin jar containing the sample slide/s.  Quickly transfer the sample slide/s from methanol to the coplin jar of 1x PBS and immerse sample slide/s 2-3 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8fcp5","text":"Transfer the sample slide/s to a second coplin jar of 1x PBS and immerse sample slide/s 2-3 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eebgu","text":"Transfer the sample coverslip to a third coplin jar of 1x PBS and immerse sample slide/s 2-3 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2tf5c","text":"Prepare the Final Fixative Solution by diluting 20 μl of the CODEX® Fixative Reagent in 1 ml of 1x PBS (Final Fixative Solution).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"du1et","text":"Remove sample slide/s from the coplin jar and place it on the tray of a humidity chamber.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4nh7u","text":"Add 200 μL of Final Fixative Solution to each of the sample slide/s and ensure that the entire tissue is covered in fixative solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bsjju","text":"Incubate for 20 mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33eom","text":"Remove the sample slide/s from the humidity chamber and place in a coplin jar containing 1x PBS. Lift and immerse the sample slide/s 2-3 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c0d1","text":"Move the sample slide/s to a second coplin jar containing 1x PBS and immerse sample slide/s 2-3 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8v93g","text":"Move the sample slide/s to a third coplin jar containing 1x PBS and immerse sample slide/s 2-3 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5k581","text":"Transfer sample slide/s to a coplin jar containing 50 mls of CODEX® Storage Buffer and store at 4°C until imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Phenocycler-Fusion Staining Protocol For FFPE Tissue
title_html: Phenocycler-Fusion Staining Protocol For FFPE Tissue

versions.title: Phenocycler-Fusion Staining Protocol For FFPE Tissue
versions.title_html: Phenocycler-Fusion Staining Protocol For FFPE Tissue
